goal.en: The objective of this course is to provide an introduction to labor economics. Topics covered in this course include minimum wage rate, guest labor, labor demand, labor supply, wage determination, human capital, educational returns, low wage phenomenon, wage inequality, labor market regulations, low birth and accelerated ageing problem and unemployment problem of young adults. A balance will be maintained between the theoretical and empirical analysis. Some examples, mostly internationally, will be provided and discussed in class. Students are invited to join the discussion in class. For each topic, academic research papers will be selected for study, aiming at enhancing students’ ability in understanding academic articles.
goal.ch: 勞動經濟學是一門探討雇主與受雇者行為之學問，內容包括貨幣面、非貨幣面與政策面的議題。課程規劃與設計的目標，在於希望學生可以充分了解其即將就業的市場。能夠擁有分析與預測相關議題未來發展的能力，以及提升經濟分析與思辨之能力，達到學以致用與提升就業力的目標。 針對上述目標，本課程在規劃上理論與實務並重。實務的議題將搭配勞動經濟學相關理論進行議題討論，包括基本工資設定之源由與變遷，外勞之引進與衝擊、社會福利制度與勞動法規對於勞動供給與需求之影響(勞健保、一例一休工時制度與退休金制度等)、少子老年化對勞動市場的衝擊、與人力素質有關的高等教育議題、台灣薪資停滯與薪資不均問題等。課程中也包含大量的台灣與其他主要國家相關議題現況與趨勢之分析、討論與比較。議題討論的流程為:1) 分析與討論國內外數據資料，深入了解每個議題國內外之趨勢；2) 講解相關理論之發展；3)彙整與討論相關實證結果，4) 閱讀各議題具代表性的期刊論文，提升修課同學閱讀專業文章之能力與未來撰寫碩論的能力。

content.en:
Week (週次/日期) Topic (單元/內容)
1 Introduction
2 National Holiday---No Class
3 Overview of labor economics
Issue 1: Uber eats --- employees or contractors? (employment status)
4 Labor demand theory (1) – firm’s decision of labor demand, elasticity of labor demand, and model specifications and empirical results.
5 Labor demand theory (2) – The impact of governmental labor policies 1
Issue 2: Minimum wage rate + journal paper
6 Labor demand theory (3) – quasi-fixed labor cost; labor market regulation + journal paper
7 Inter-university Activity Week--- No Class
8 Labor Supply Theory (1) – An individual’s labor supply decision, elasticity of labor supply, and empirical results.
9 Labor Supply Theory (2) – Sample selection correction
+ journal paper
10 Labor Supply Theory (3) –The impact of governmental labor policies
Issue 3: Guest labor policy + journal paper
11 Midterm examination
12 Low birth rate and aging society
Issue 4: Pension system in Taiwan
13 Wage determination theory (1) – Human capital theory, compensation wage differential and signaling theory. + journal paper
14 Wage determination theory (2) – Wage stagnancy
Issue 5: Real wage stagnancy in Taiwan + journal paper
15 Wage determination theory (3) – Wage Inequality
16 Final examination
